hadiths.text: Malik said:There is no harm in uttering supplication in prayer, in its beginning, in its middle, and in the end, in obligatory prayer or other

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُسْتَفْتَحُ بِهِ الصَّلاَةُ مِنَ الدُّعَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Supplication With Which The Prayer Should Be Started
